segments.text: Hi , I would like to return this TV .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Sure , do you have the receipt ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah here you go . Actually I also want to return this keyboard .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Ok . may I ask what is the reason for returning these products ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The TV flickers a lot when I am watching a movie and at times the image is not very clear .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I see , and what about the keyboard ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I spilled some coffee on it and now it won't work .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I am sorry mam , but we can only exchange or refund defective products , we cannot take responsibility for misuse or damages .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Fine ! I don't know why they make these things so delicate anyways .
segments.speaker: S1
